languages.text:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

languages.text:
装备者在使用长剑时，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%。
每当装备者使用长剑招架攻击时，都会立刻进行反击，且使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。
如果攻击者已经处于恐慌状态，则装备者的招架额外提高{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%。

Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

traits.locale_text:
装备者在使用长剑时，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高<u>（2×{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>%。
每当装备者使用长剑招架攻击时，都会立刻进行反击，且使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。
如果攻击者已经处于恐慌状态，则装备者的招架额外提高<u>（5×敏捷加值）</u>%。

装备者在使用长剑时，{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}提高{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%。
每当装备者使用长剑招架攻击时，都会立刻进行反击，且使目标陷入{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}状态。
如果攻击者已经处于恐慌状态，则装备者的招架额外提高{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%。

languages.text:
При использовании мечей персонаж получает +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Парировав атаку с помощью меча, персонаж может немедленно контратаковать, накладывая на противника {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.
Если противник ошеломлен, парирование персонажа увеличивается на {uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

traits.locale_text:
При использовании мечей персонаж получает +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Парировав атаку с помощью меча, персонаж может немедленно контратаковать, накладывая на противника {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.
Если противник ошеломлен, парирование персонажа увеличивается на <u>(5 × бонус ЛВК)</u>%.

При использовании мечей персонаж получает +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g})</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Парировав атаку с помощью меча, персонаж может немедленно контратаковать, накладывая на противника {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.
Если противник ошеломлен, парирование персонажа увеличивается на <u>(5 × бонус ЛВК)</u>%.

При использовании мечей персонаж получает +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% к {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g}.
Парировав атаку с помощью меча, персонаж может немедленно контратаковать, накладывая на противника {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}ошеломление{/g}.
Если противник ошеломлен, парирование персонажа увеличивается на {uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

languages.text:
使用者が剣を使用する場合、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が+{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%上昇する。
使用者が剣を使用して受け流すたびに、直ちに反撃を行い、攻撃してくる敵を{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態に陥らせる。
攻撃者がよろけると、使用者の受け流しが+{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%増える。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

traits.locale_text:
使用者が剣を使用する場合、<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>％の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を獲得する。
使用者が剣を使用して受け流すたびに、直ちにカウンター攻撃を行い、攻撃してくる敵を{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態に陥らせる。
攻撃者がよろけると、使用者の受け流しが<u>(5 × AGIボーナス)</u>％増える。

使用者が剣を使用する場合、{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}％の{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}を獲得する。
使用者が剣を使用して受け流すたびに、直ちにカウンター攻撃を行い、攻撃してくる敵を{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}状態に陥らせる。
攻撃者がよろけると、使用者の受け流しが{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}％増える。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} al usar espadas.
Cada vez que el portador pare un ataque con una espada, realizará inmediatamente un contraataque, provocando que el enemigo atacante quede {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.
Si el atacante está desequilibrado, la parada del portador aumenta +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} %.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} al usar espadas.
Cada vez que el portador pare un ataque con una espada, realizará inmediatamente un contraataque, provocando que el enemigo atacante quede {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.
Si el atacante está desequilibrado, la parada del portador aumenta +<u>(5 × bonificación por AGI)</u> %.

El portador obtiene +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} al usar espadas.
Cada vez que el portador pare un ataque con una espada, realizará inmediatamente un contraataque, provocando que el enemigo atacante quede {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.
Si el atacante está desequilibrado, la parada del portador aumenta +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} %.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} mit Schwertern.
Wenn der Träger mit einem Schwert pariert, vollzieht er sofort einen Gegenangriff und belegt den angreifenden Feind mit {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.
Wenn der Angreifer taumelt, erhöht sich Parieren des Trägers um +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} %.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} beim Verwenden von Schwertern.
Immer wenn der Träger mit einem Schwert pariert, vollzieht er sofort einen Gegenangriff und verursacht beim angreifenden Feind {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g}.
Wenn der Angreifer taumelt, erhöht sich Parieren des Trägers um +<u>(5 × BEW-Bonus)</u> %.

Der Träger erhält +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} % {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} beim Verwenden von Schwertern.
Immer wenn der Träger mit einem Schwert pariert, vollzieht er sofort einen Gegenangriff und verursacht beim angreifenden Feind {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumeln{/g}.
Wenn der Angreifer taumelt, erhöht sich Parieren des Trägers um +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} %.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} lorsqu'il utilise des épées.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur pare à l'aide d'une épée, il contre-attaque immédiatement, ce qui inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à l'attaquant ennemi.
Si l'attaquant subit l'effet Sidération, la parade de l'utilisateur augmente de +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} %.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}% {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} when using swords.
Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.

traits.locale_text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} lorsqu'il utilise des épées.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur pare à l'aide d'une épée, il contre-attaque immédiatement, ce qui inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à l'attaquant ennemi.
Si l'attaquant subit l'effet Sidération, la parade de l'utilisateur augmente de +<u>(5 × bonus d'AGI)</u> %.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de +<u>(2 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g})</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} lorsqu'il utilise des épées.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur pare à l'aide d'une épée, il contre-attaque immédiatement, ce qui inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à l'attaquant ennemi.
Si l'attaquant subit l'effet Sidération, la parade de l'utilisateur augmente de +<u>(5 × bonus d'AGI)</u> %.

L'utilisateur bénéficie de +{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} % de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} lorsqu'il utilise des épées.
Chaque fois que l'utilisateur pare à l'aide d'une épée, il contre-attaque immédiatement, ce qui inflige l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} à l'attaquant ennemi.
Si l'attaquant subit l'effet Sidération, la parade de l'utilisateur augmente de +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} %.

languages.text:
Giyen kişi, kılıç kullarken +%{uip|Parry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} kazanır.
Giyen kişi, kılıçla savuşturma yaptığında anında karşı saldırı gerçekleştirir ve saldıran düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallamasına{/g} sebep olur.
Saldırgan afallarsa giyen kişinin savuşturma değeri +%{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673} kadar artar.

Whenever the wearer parries with a sword, they immediately counter attack, causing the attacking enemy to become {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.
If the attacker is staggered, the wearer's parry is increased by +{uip|StaggerParry|b94daa0387c640f29b5b561dc37ff673}%.
